description: [jRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0283) can list security software, such as by using WMIC to identify anti-virus products installed on the victimâ€™s machine and to obtain firewall details.(Citation: jRAT Symantec Aug 2018)(Citation: Kaspersky Adwind Feb 2016)
